ServiceSpecificationSchema:serviceSpecif.name: NW-NM TP Maritime Cloud Service
ServiceSpecificationSchema:serviceSpecif.description: The NW-NM service specification defines a combined NW-NM TP model along with the actual service API used for accessing NW-NM data, as registered in the Maritime Cloud service catalogue.
ServiceSpecificationSchema:serviceSpecif.keywords: pNW, NM, Navigational Warnings, Notices to Mariners, MSI, Maritime Cloud Service

requirement.name: Combined NW-NM model
requirement.text: The data model should encapsulate a combined NW-NM model.

requirement.name: Return all published NW-NM messages.
requirement.text: The NW-NM service should make it possible to retrieve all published NW-NM messages from the given service provider.

serviceInterface.name: MessageService
serviceInterface.description: Works according to the request response pattern.
